infotexts.entitydescription.shield_coilgunshotguna: This handcrafted coilgun ammo-box was designed by Shield to provide the experience of being able to rip and tear fish and foes alike.
infotexts.entitydescription.shield_uraniumrodcoilg: This handcrafted coilgun ammo-box was designed by Shield's engineering team to put use to useless uranium fuel rods.
infotexts.entityname.shield_healthscanner: Diving mask with intergrated Health Scanner HUD
infotexts.entitydescription.shield_healthscanner: This makeshift diving mask allows the user to benefit from the HUD Scanner while wearing a smart-breathing divingmask, not to mention the adjustable strap on the back to hold any small items you wish to keep close.
